item.description:
Hello Conscious Creators!

January's discussion was about setting an intention of what you want to create in 2010.

This month we will talk about limiting thoughts and how to manage an inner critic.

Do you think you can manifest all of your goals and dreams this year?

Let's discuss how to manage the thoughts that keep you from attracting what you want.

Join us to expand your beliefs and live more consciously! We meet to share philosophies, ideas and connect with others who enjoy exploring endless possibilities, seeing all our experiences as a valuable life lesson to create the change we desire.

We meet from 9:30am-11:00am in the back room. If the room is not available, look for our meetup sign on a table. Call me if you can't find us!

Panera is in a small plaza of shops after Kelly's, next to Marshalls and across the street from Target off the Lynn Fells Pkwy. It is on the South side of Route 1.

See you there!

Julie
Organizer
617-678-5061

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Thought Management
